name: BARRAGE / 铁幕
description: Tired of "Pew-Pew"pistol,Why not try about Bofors 40mm Anti-Aircraft Guns,or Mighty 88mm Flak-cannon?Shatter the sky with your BARRAGE,and ther is nothing like aiming or reloading can distrub you from shooting.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel i5-4570 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel i7-4790 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1070 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
